https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cEXIJksGv9YfbQHdc4Aq4bftANb.jpg APEX: The Secret Race Across America is a documentary film that takes viewers on a fast-paced ride through the illegal, underground world of U.S. transcontinental racing. How fast can you drive cross-country? APEX: The Secret Race Across America
